message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! While I appreciate the opportunity, $150 is a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that 150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for 130. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $130 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go to $115.  If we can meet in the middle, I think we can make a deal.
Hi Bob, I understand that 130 is still a bit high for you, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for 125. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
